requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB +
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Normal PCs should be fine with this game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB +
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
